SELECT a.*, b.ParSingleName, c.NAME, e.ProdNameC, d.SName, f.ColorCode, f.Pieces, f.SubQuan, g.MHName, g.CrockKind FROM DyeMachineD a LEFT JOIN WOHead f ON a.Manu = f.ManuCrock LEFT JOIN Custom b ON f.CustCode = b.ParComID LEFT JOIN ManuProcess c ON f.CurrProcCode = c.CODE LEFT JOIN ProdColor d ON f.ColorCode = d.SCode LEFT JOIN Product e ON f.ProdCode = e.ProdCode LEFT JOIN DyeMachineH g ON a.MHCode = g.MHCode
a.Manu LIKE '%${params.manuCrock}%'
